title: [K-12] COVID-19 Diagnosis and AI Image Analysis: Deep Learning-Based Medical Imaging Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, programming (Python), and medical imaging comprehension
context.additional_context: Experiencing the COVID-19 diagnostic process through analysis of real medical imaging data and simulations in a VR environment

learning_goals: Learners will explain the deep learning model structure for identifying COVID-19 features in CT/X-ray images.
By applying medical image dataset preprocessing and augmentation techniques, learners will improve model training accuracy by at least 85%.
Learners will analyze ethical/legal issues of AI-based diagnostic systems and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
